payload.name: hierarchical-rl
payload.title: Hierarchical RL: delegation as options with initiation/termination
payload.formal: options (o) have policies (\pi_o), initiation sets (I_o), termination (\beta_o).
payload.apm2_mapping: holons supervising sub-holons are options. Encode initiation/termination conditions as contracts and stop conditions in the holon trait context. Delegation without termination conditions is how you get infinite recursion and runaway autonomy.
